Alliance base's shuttles will be modified to three man transports as 
soon as the rule takes global effect.

::Repressor::

Repressor growls, looking at Lady Hawk and Najah.

"Try me," he replies to Lady Hawk's earlier question about firing in 
the shuttle, "I'm a very good aim, I won't miss."

He looks out of the cockpit at the land they were passing by, "Now 
would you two shut up? You're getting on my nerves."






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> "You may be right." Lady Hawk responds as sure of herself as 
ever. "At least
> I'll let you think you are until it's no longer convenient for me 
for you to
> think so." She'd learned a few things from foxfingers as well. One 
thing she
> learned was that self confidence usually brought death. "Can't this 
thing go
> any faster, I'm growing bored with the lack of intelligent company."
